bibl.title: Ātmabodhaprakaraṇa of Śaṅkarācārya with a commentary ascribed to Mahusūdana Sarasvatī
Edited with an introduction and notes by Dinesh Chandra Bhattacharya, Sāstrī, Tarka-Vedānta-tīrtha.
bibl.note: This SARIT edition omits the preface and introduction from this edition.

objectDesc.p: Written in clear Bengali script on machine-made paper. It contains 17 folia (34 pages) of 10.75" x 4" size, each page containing 6 lines. It contains only the commentary entitled Ātmabodhaṭīkā without the text of Ātmabodha. No name of the author or the scribe is mentioned anywhere. It is full of misreadings and omissions.

This is microfilm copy of the manuscript deposited in the India Office Library, London. The manuscript its numbered as--Sanskrit 2296. Egg 2296, I.O. 2011a, and bears the title Ātmabodhaprakaraṇaṃ saṭīkam. It contains both the text and the commentary of the Ātmabodha. It is complete in 16 folia with 10 to 12 lines on each page. It is written in Devanāgarī script without any mention of date, author or scribe. But a colophon with Śaṅkarācārya's name as the author of the Ātmabodha appears at the end.

editorialDecl.p: The published edition from which this e-text was transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ
Text division is as Devanāgarī ("ityevam" not "ity evam".)

div.head: ātmabodhaḥIM reads ātmabodhaprakaraṇam.

div.p: ātmabodhaṭīkāIM reads atha ātmabodhaprakaraṇaṭīkāprārambhaḥ. |
oṃ namo durgāyaiIM begins with śrīmārtaṇḍo jayatu, and a verse--śatamakhapūjitapādaṃ śatapathamanasopyagocarākāraṃ | vikasitajalaruhanetraṃ sītāchāyāṃkamāśraye rāmam || |

tatraIM--iha bhagavān śaṃkarācārya uttamādhikāriṇāṃ vedāntaprasthānatrayaṃThe upaniṣads, the Gīta and the Brahmasūtras are called the three prasthānas, on which Śaṅkara wrote commentaries. IM omits from vedāntaprasthānatrayaṃ upto anugrahāya. nirmāya tadavalokanāsamarthānāṃ mandabuddhināmanugrahāya vedāntasiddhāntasaṃgrahamātmabodhākhyaprakaraṇaṃ didarśayiṣuḥIM-- nirdida pratijānīte--tapobhiriti |

kṛcchracāndrāyaṇanityanaimittikāIM--kādyanu. nuṣṭhānarūpaistapobhiḥ kṣīṇāni pāpāni rāgādyantaḥkaraṇadoṣā yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ, nityanaimittikaireva kurvāṇo duritakṣayamiti vacanātThis portion of the verse is found quoted by the different commentators. |

at eva śāntānāmakṣobhitāśayāṇāṃ, vītarāgiṇāmihāmutraphalabhogecchāIM-- bhogarahitānāṃrahitānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ saṃsāragranthibhedane vitataprayatātmanāṃIM--kṛtaprayatnānāṃ yathoktasādhanasampannānāmayamātmabodho vidhīyate vidhimukhenāvaśyakatayā pratipādyate ityarthaḥ ||1||

lg.l: pākasya vahnivajjñānaṃ vinā mokṣo na sidhyati ||2||

div.p: nanu tapoyogamantrakarmayāgādyanekasādhaneṣu satsu mokṣaṃ prati bodha eva kimiti prādhānyena ucyate ityataIM--tatrāha bodha iti āha--bodho'nyeti |

tapoyogamantrakarmayāgādīniIM reads tapomantrakarmayogādisādhanāni sādhanāṇi paramparākrameṇa IM reads paramparayā krameṇa jñānadvārā mokṣaṃ sādhayanti, jñānantu svajanmamātrādevājñānaṃ niḥśeṣaṃ nāśayitvā mumukṣuṃ svārājye'bhiṣecayati, ato'nyasādhanebhyo jñānasya prādhānyamuktam |
tadeva dṛṣṭāntena draḍhayatiIM reads spaṣṭayati. --pākasyeti |
yathā loke pacanakriyāSM reads pacanakriyāyāṃ kāṣṭhajalabhāṇḍādisādhaneṣu satsvapi vahniṃ vinā na SM reads tanna sidhyati tadvat jñānaṃ vinā mokṣo na sidhyatītyartha ||2||

nanu karmaṇāṃ vicitraśāktitvāt karmaivājñānaṃIM reads karmeva kiñcidajñānaṃ. nāśayiṣyati kimātmajñānenetyāśaṃkyāha IM reads tyāśaṃkya karmājñānayorvirodhābhāvānnaivamityāha--avirodhīti | karmaṇo'vidyāvirodhitvābhāvādajñānaṃ nāśayituṃ notsahate vidyāyāḥ prakāśarūpatvādaṃdhaṃ tamastejapuñjamiva nāśayituṃ samartha ityarthaḥ--avirodhitayeti spaṣṭārthaḥ ||3||

lg.l: paricchinnaVanivilas edition reads avacchinna. ivājñānāttannāśe sati kevalaḥ |

div.p: nanu pratiśarīramātmā paricchinna ivoIM reads eva for iva.palamyate kathaṃ kaivalya IM reads kathamasya kevalatvamityatrāha.mityāha 'paricchinna' iti |

paripūrṇasyādvitīyasyātmano'jñānavikalpitoccāvacaśarīrādhyāsakṛtaparicchinnatvameva na tu tattvadṛṣṭyā, ato vivekenāvivekahānātSM reads vivekāvivavekahānāt which is evidently a misreading. IM reads vivekajñānāt. ātmā kevala eva prakāśate meghāvaraṇābhāve bhānuvadityarthaḥ ||4||
nanvātmajñānāIM reads ātmano'dvaitajñānāda. tadvaitasiddhirayuktā vṛttiIM omits vṛttijñānena dvaitasiddherityata āha--'ajñānakaluṣamiti' |

ajñānakāryabhūtairahaṃkārādibhiḥIM reads rahamādibhiḥ. kaluṣīkṛtaṃ katṛtvabhoktṛtvādyabhimāninaṃ IM omits bhoktṛtva. jīvaṃ, jñānaṃ IM reads jñānaṃkatṛ. cirakālābhyāsādajñānahānadvārā tatkāryāntaḥkaraṇādikamaśeṣatoIM reads niḥśeṣaṃ. nāśayitvā svayamapiIM reads eva for api. naśyatyajñānakāryatvādvṛtteḥ tatIM reads tatra for tat.pratibimbitaṃ jñānamātmābhāsatvādātmanyevaIM reads ātmanaiva. ekībhavati; tadānīmadvaya evātmā prakāśate, yathā katakareṇurakhilaṃ jalaṃ nirmalaṃ kṛtvā svayamapiIM reads eva for api. naśyati tadvadityarthaḥ ||5||
nanvaparokṣatayānubhūyamānasya saṃsārasya kathamatyantāsattvaṃ pratyakṣavirūddhamityāśaṃkya svapnadṛṣṭāntena tasyaIM reads asya for tasya. mithyātvaṃ sādhayati--'saṃsāra' iti |

rāgadveṣādibhiḥ saṃsāraḥIM reads saṃsāraḥ after saṃkulāyamānaḥ. saṃkulāyamānaḥ, svakāle IM reads svapnavat after svakāle. svasya kāraṇabhūtājñāne sthite sati tāvanmithyābhūto'pi saṃsāraḥ sannevāvabhātiIM reads satyavadbhāti., prabodhe sati vākyārthaIM omits artha.śravaṇādātmajñānotpattau asanneva IM reads satyāmasadiva after jñānotpattau which is evidently a mis-reading. bhavati |
atraIM reads tatra for atra. dṛṣṭāntaḥ svapnatulya iti |

svapno'piIM reads svapnohi. yāvannidrānubhūyate tāvanmithyābhūto'pi satya iva bhāti, prabodhe nidrānāśe sati svapno mithyā bhavati, tadvat saṃsāra ityarthaḥIM omits from sati upto ityarthaḥ and reads mithyā tadvadityarthaḥ after nidrānāśe. ||6||
jaganmithyātvaṃIM reads jaganmithyātvameva dṛṣṭāntāntareṇa. dṛṣṭāntena draḍhayati--tāvaditi |

yathā yāvannīlapṛṣṭhatrikoṇādiviśeṣajñānaṃ notpadyate tāvadrajatajñānaṃ satyamivānubhūyate, IM reads satyameva. tathā sarvādhiṣṭḥānabhūtaṃ saccidānandādvayaṃ brahma yāvanna jñāyate sākṣānnānubhūyate IM omits from tathā upto nānubhūyate. tāvajjagadākāreṇa pariṇataḥ saṃsāraḥ satyaIM reads sa iva. iva bhrāntyā dṛśyate ityarthaḥ ||7||

lg.l: sargasthitilayān yānti budbudānīva vāriṇiThis verse is numbered as the eighth in Vanivilas and other editions of Atmabodha. But none of our manuscripts (SM and IM) contains the verse or any commentary on it. So, it seems that some manuscripts of Atmabodha did not include this verse, and counted the next verse as eighth and so on. We, however, include the verse though without any commentary, and number the verses accordingly. ||8||

div.p: sarvaṃ dṛśyaṃ prapañcajātaṃ brahmaṇyeva māyayāIM reads māyākalpitamiti. kalpitamiti pratipādayati--saccidātmanīti |

satyajñānānandātmani nitye sarvānusyūteIM reads viṣṇau after sarvānusyūte. vyāpake brahmaṇi sarvā vyaktayoIM omits vyaktayo. devatiryaṅnarasthāvarajaṅgamādayo'pi vividhā api vyaktayaḥ sarvopādānabhūte parameśvare hātākeIM omits hāṭake. hemni kaṭakamukuṭādaya iva kalpitā eva, brahmaṇo'bhinnā ityarthaḥ ||9||IM and SM count this verse as '8' and so on.

quote.p: hṛṣīkeśo manaḥprabhṛtisarvendriyapravartakoIM reads prakāśakaḥ for pravartako. niyāmako vā, vibhuḥ sarvagataḥ parameśvaraḥ svamāyākalpita IM reads svamāyayā kalpita.nānāvidhopādhiṣu pratibimbitaḥ sannāneva bhātiIM reads bhavati for bhāti., tannāśe sati brahmātmaikyajñānena taṣāṃ māyāparikalpitānāṃ nāśātIM reads dehādyupādhināṃ nāśo sati for nāśāt. kevala eva bhāti, yathākāśo ?bopādhivaśānnāneva bhāti upādhilayādeka IM reads vilayāt for layāt/ eva bhāti tadvadityarthaḥ ||10||

div.p: nanu sarvadeheṣuIM reads sarvadehatattajātyā. tattajjātyādibhiranuviddhasya kathaṃ nityatvamucyate tatrāha--nānopādhīti |

pūrvoktanānopādhivaśādevātmani jātināmāśramādayaIM reads varṇa instead of nāma. āropitā māyāparikalpitā na tu svataḥIM reads na tattvataḥ., yathā svabhāvamadhuraṃ jalaṃ kaṭukaṣāyāmlaraktapītādidravyopetaṃ sat tadrupaṃ bhajatiIM reads bhavati. na tu svarūpataIM reads svarūpeṇa. stadvadityarthaḥ ||11||
ātmano'vidyāparikalpitopādhitrayaIM reads trayamadhye sthūlopādhimāha--. māha--pañcīkṛteti |

pañcānāṃ bhūtānāṃIM reads pañcabhūtānāṃ. pratyekaṃ dvidhā vibhacya IM wronly omits from tatrai upto vibhacya.tatraikaikamardhaṃ caturdhā samaṃ vibhacya svāṃśaṃ parityacyetareṣu yojanaṃ pañcīkaraṇam; evaṃ pañcīkṛtebhyaḥ sthūlapṛthivyādimahābhūtebhyaḥ sambhavo yasya tat karmasaṃcitaṃSM reads saṃsyūtaṃ. prārabdhakarmabhiḥ sañcitaṃ racitaṃ sthūlaśarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhabhogānāmāyatanaṃ IM readssukhaduḥkhānāmāyatanaṃ. bhogasthānaṃ pratyagātmana iti ||12||
sūkṣmopādhimāha--pañcaprāṇeti |

pañcaprāṇā ekasyaiva mahāprāṇasya prāṇādayo vṛttayaḥ, jñānendriyakarmendriyabhedenendriyāṇi daśa, manaḥśabdena saṃkalpavikalpātmakāntaḥkaraṇavṛttiSM reads ucyate after vṛttiḥ. buddhirniścayātmikā, etaiḥ saṃyuktamapañcīkṛtasūkṣmabhūtoththaṃ sūkṣmabhūtebhyo jātaṃ sūkṣmāṅgaṃ liṅgaśarīraṃ sukhaduḥkhabhogasādhanamityarthaḥSM reads ucyate after sādhanam ||13||
tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇopādhimāha--anādyavidyeti |
sadasadbhrāmanirvācyā'nādibhūtāIM reads anirvacanīyā for anirvācyā. kāraṇopādhirūcyate, sā ca vyaṣṭisamaṣṭibhedena sthūlasūkṣmaprapañcayoḥ kāraṇabhūtatvāt kāraṇopādhirūcyate |
upādhitrayakathanaprayojanamāha-upādhitritayādanyamiti |
tatsākṣiṇamātmānamavadhārayejjānīyādityarthaḥ ||14||
nanvannamayādyeṣu koṣeṣu vyāpya tattanmayatayā sthitasya kuto nityamuktatva IM reads nityatvamucyate.mityāśaṅkrāha--pañcakoṣādīti |

annamaya-prāṇamaya-manomaya-vijñānamayānandamayāḥ pañcakoṣāḥ, ādiśabdenāśanā IM reads pipāsādīnāṃ for aśanādīnāṃ.dīnāṃ grahaṇam, etauryogena mithyātādātmyena tattanmaya iva sthita ātmā śuddhoIM reads śuddhātmā for ātmā śuddho. na tu teṣu vastuto rañcanāviśiṣṭo'pi | IM reads vastuṣu rañjitaḥ for vastuto rañcanāviśiṣṭo'pi.

IM reads vede'pi before sa vā.sa vā eṣa puruṣo'nnarasamaya ityādibhiḥ sūkṣmavastudarśanārthamevopādhisthaṃ brahma sūcayati na tu tattvadṛṣṭyā, yathā nirmalasphaṭiko nīlapītavastrādiyogena tattanmaya iva bhāti IM reads vastuto'pi nāsti tasya rañjanādi.vastuto nāsti rañjanā tadvadityarthaḥ ||15||
asaṅgātmasvarūpajñānavivecanaprakāramāha-vapuriti |

vapuḥ sthūlaśarīraṃ tadiva tuṣastadādibhiryuktaṃSM and IM read-- pañcakoṣaistāvadātmani sthitaṃ vapuḥ sthūlaśarīraṃ tuṣādibhiryuktaṃ, etc. The logical connection in the verse seems to be a bit difficult. The readings in the commentary of both the Mss. render no meaning. So some words have been inserted in the commentary for the logical connection and meaning. taṇḍulamiva pañcakoṣaistāvat sthitamāntaramātmānaṃ yuktyavadhātataḥ yuktirūpāvahananāt śuddhaṃ viviñcyātSM reads śuddhataṇḍulamiva vivicyāt jānīyādityarthaḥ. vivekena jānīyādityarthaḥ IM reads here more as--kathamayaṃ sthūladehavadityanumānādibhyaḥ kośebhyo bhinnamātmānaṃ vivicya jānīyādityarthaḥ | ||16||

lg.l: sadā sarvagato'pyātmā na savatrāvabhāsateIM reads prakāśyate for avabhāsate. |
buddhāvevāvabhāsate svaccheṣuIM reads the second line as-- buddhāvevātra dṛśye na sthūleṣu pratibimbavat. pratibimbavat ||17||

div.p: nanvātmā sarvagatastarhi kiṃ sarvatra sarvairna dṛśyate ityatrāha--sadā sarvagata iti |

ātmā sarvagato'pi sarvatra vyāpyaIM reads āpya for vyāpya. sthito'pi jaḍairbahivṛttibhirakṣairna prakāśyateSM reads prakāśate., rāgādibhiraviddhāyāṃ buddhāveva prakāśateIM reads avabhāsate for prakāśate. na sarvatra, yathā pratibimbaḥ svaccheṣveva darpaṇādiṣu dṛśyate nānyatra tadvadityarthaḥ ||17||
deheṣvavasthitasyāpyātmana audāsīnyaṃ rājapuruṣadṛṣṭāntenāha-dehendriyeti |
IM omits from dehendriya... upto dṛśyāśceti.dehendriyamanobuddhiprakṛtayaḥ kiṃbhūtāḥ? jaḍāḥ pariṇāmiṇyo dṛśyāśceti |

dehendriyamanobuddhiprakṛtibhyo jaḍadṛśyapariṇāmibhyo vilakṣaṇaIM reads śuddhātmānaṃ for ātmānaṃ. mātmānaṃ tadvṛttīnāṃ sākṣitayā sthitaṃ, yathā rājā svanagare sthito mantriṣu pravartamāneṣu svayaṃ sākṣitayā tān paśyanSM reads some word like nānupaṇyaḥ which is evidently a misreading. tiṣṭhati, tadvadeva jānīyādityarthaḥ ||18||
nanvātmano'vikāritvamayuktaṃ yataḥ sarvadā vyāpāravān dṛśyate, tatrāha--vyāpṛteṣviti |
indriyādiṣuIM reads svaviṣayeṣu after indriyādiṣu. vyāpṛteṣu satsu ātmā vyāpārīvāvivekināṃ guruśāstrādyupadeśarahitānāṃ dṛśyate na tu tattvadṛśām |
yathā meghakhaṇḍeṣu vāyuvaśād dhāvatsu candro'pi dhāvatīva lokairdṛśyate na tu candramā dhāvati tathā ātmāpītyarthaḥ ||19||
nanu dehendriyamanobuddhayaścetanāIM reads here sacetanāḥ kimātmacaitatyena. dṛśyante, kimātmanā, tatrāha--ātmacaitanyamiti |
nityajñānasvarūpamātmacaitanyamāśritya dehendriyamanobuddhyādayaḥ svakīyārtheṣu svaviśayeṣu SM omits svaviṣayeṣu. vartante, yathā prāṇinaḥ sūryaprakāmāśritya svavyāpāreṣu vyavaharanti |
SM omits this portion but reads ātmacaitanyena ātmajñānena dehendriyādayo'pi jñāninaḥ, vastuto jñānamātmanyeva in its stead. ataścaitanyamātmana eva, dehendriyādayo jaḍa evetyarthaḥ ||20||
nanvahaṃ jāto'smi bālyakaumārādyavasthāmanubhavāmīIM reads avikāritvamucyate. tyādyanavaratamanubhūyamānasyātmanaḥ kathamavikāritva IM reads avikāritvamucyate.mityata āha--dehendriyeti |

dehendriyamanobuddhidharmāścaturṇāṃ sattvādīn karmāṇi ca karmendriyavyāpārān mithyātādātmyena sthite'male'saṅgarūpeIM reads nirmale for amale. saccidānandātmake paramātmanyeva etatsāmīpyādavivekato'dhasyanti yathā gagane nīlatādi |
ataste ātmadharmā na bhavanti kintu dehādīnāmevetyarthaḥ ||21||
nanu kartṛtvabhoktṛtvādikamātmani IM reads anavaratam for sadaiva.sadaivānubhūyamānatvād durvāramityāśaṃkya tadapi tathaiva mithyetyāha--ajñānāditi |

IM reads ajñānavaśāt mānasopādhirahaṃkāra instead of ajñānānmānasopādhe.ajñānānmānasopādhe stasyaiva kartṛtvādayo dharmā atattvajñānavaśādātmani kalpyante, yathāmbhasaścalanādikamambuni pratiphalite IM reads candramasi for candre. candre'vivekataḥ kalpyate tadvadityarthaḥ ||22||
icchādveṣasukhaduḥkhādīn (ātmanaḥ) manyante vaiśeṣikādayaḥ, tannirākaroti--rāgeccheti |
rāgecchādisukhaduḥkhaprayatnādikaṃ sarvaṃ buddhereva na tvātmanaḥ |

katham? jāgratsvapnayorbuddhau satyāṃ rāgādi pravartate, susuptau tasyā SM wrongly reads na tasyāśca nāśe instead of tasyā buddhernāśe. buddhernāśe kāraṇe laye SM reads līne for laye. na pravartate, tasmāt buddhereva dharmāIM mis-reads bhramaḥ for dharmā. na tvātmana ityarthaḥ ||23||
tarhi kīdṛgātmasvabhāvaIM reads ātmā kīdṛksvabhāvaḥ for kīdṛgātmasvabhāvaḥ. ityāśaṃkyātmasvabhāvamupadiśati--prakāśa iti |
yathā prakāśa evārkasya svabhāvaḥ, toyasya śaityam, agneruṣṇatā tathātmano'pi saccidānandanityanirmalatā svabhāvaḥ svarūpamityarthaḥ ||24||
yadyavikāryātmā tarhi jānāmīti pratyayaḥ kathamityapekṣāyāmāha--ātmana iti |

pratyagātmanaḥIM reads pratyagātmani for pratyagātmanaḥ. saccidaṃśaḥ, aṃśa ivāṃśa ātmābhāso buddhivṛttiścaitadda yamavivekena saṃyojya, IM omits yadyapi.yadyapyasaṅgasyātmanaḥ kenāpi saṃyogo nāstyeva tathāpyajñānavaśānmelanaṃ saṃbhāvya, jānāmīti pratyayo'haṃkāravṛttiḥ pravartate |
kevale pratyagātmani na kaścidvikāro'stīti bhāsaḥ ||25||

lg.l: ātmano vikriyā nāsti buddherbodho na jātviti |
jīvaḥ sarvamalaṃ jñātvā jñātā draṣṭeti muhyati ||26||

div.p: etadeva spaṣṭayati--ātmano vikriyā nāstīti |
ātmā svabhāvādeva vikriyārahitaḥIM reads vikāraśūnyo for vikriyārahitaḥ., buddheḥ kadācidapi bodhaśaṃkaiva nāsti |

tathāpi jīvaḥ sābhāsāhaṃkāraḥIM reads here as follows: sarvaṃ sābhāsāntaḥkaraṇavṛttināṃ taptāyaḥpiṇḍavadekatra saṃgatya tamevālamatyarthaṃ jñātvā dehendriyādikamahamiti vicāryāhaṃ kartāhaṃ draṣṭeti muhyati |--sābhāsāntaḥkaraṇaḥ sarvaṃ jñātvāhaṃ jñātāSM reads kartā for jñātā. draṣṭeti muhyatiThe word alam in the sloka should be connected with muhyati as alaṃ muhyati, atyartha muhyati ityarthaḥ. bhrānto bhavatītyarthaḥ ||26||

lg.l: rajjusarpavadātmānaṃ jīvaṃ jñāvaṃ jñātvā bhayaṃ vahet |

div.p: ātmā svayameva svasminnavivekena anyadharmānāropya bibhetītyāha--rajjusarpavaditi |

yathā mandāndhakārādau sarpāropaṃ kṛtvā bhayakampādikaṃ vahedevamātmāpi svasmin jīvatvamāropya svaṃ sadvitīyaṃ paricchinnaṃ jñātvā bhayaṃ vahedSM omits bhayaṃ vahet. duḥkhasāgare nimagnoSM reads bahuduḥkhasāgaranimagno. bhavati |

yadā śāstrācāryapratipāditenaIM reads śāstrācāryapratyādeśena. śāstrārthajñānaIM reads śāstrīyaṃ jñānam. mutpannaṃ bhavati tadā vivekacakṣuṣā svamātmānamakhaṇḍānandajñānaikarūpaṃ saṃpaśyan tato nāhaṃ jīvaḥ paramātmā'hamiti jñātvāSM omits jñātvā. bhayaduḥkharahitaḥ sukhī bhavet ||27||

lg.l: dīpo ghaṭādivat svātmāIM reads sākṣī for svātmā. jaḍaistairnāvabhāsyate ||28||

div.p: nanvātmā atyantasāmīpyakairbuddhimano'haṃkārādibhiḥ kathaṃ nāvalokyate--na jñāyate tatrāha--ātmeti |

ātmā kevalaIM reads eka eva. eva sannapi buddhimano'haṃkārādīnyavabhāsayati, tai jaḍairmanādibhirātmā nāvabhāsyate, yathā eka eva dīpo ghaṭādīn sarvānapyavabhāsayati, taiIM reads prakāśitaḥ for taiḥ.rghaṭādibhirdīpo nāvabhāsyate, tadvadityarthaḥ ||28||
ātmā buddhyahaṃkārādibhirnāvabhāsyate yadi tarhi ātmajñāne jñānāntareṇa bhavitavyamityāśaṃkyāha--svabodhe iti SM wrongly omits from ātmajñāne upto svabodha iti. |

ātmano bodharūpatvāt svabodhe nitye sati, tasyātmano bodhāya jñānāntarāpekṣā nāstyeva, anubhavarūpatvāt, IM reads svānubhavatvāt for anubhavarūpatvāt. yathā dīpasya svaprakāśakāleIM reads prakāśane for svaprakāśakāle. dīpāntarāpekṣā nāsti tadvadityarthaḥ ||29||
yadi buddhyādibhirātmā jñēyo na bhavet tarhi ātmajñāne upāyāntaraṃ vācyam, sa upāyaḥ ka ityāha--niṣidhyeti |

athāta ādeśo neti netītyatannirasanavedavākyaiSM reads netyatannirasanādeva iti vedavākyaiḥ which is evidently a misreading. nikhilopādhīnniṣidhyaIM reads ātmānaṃ jñātvā after niṣidhya, and omits from anātmatvena upto nirasya. anātmatvena jñātvā taṃ nirasya 'tattvamasi'Chāndyogyopaniṣad--6-11. 'ayamātmā brahme' Māndukyopaniṣad--1. tyādi mahāvākyaiSM wrongly reads tatrāhamiti vākyaiḥ for mahāvākyaiḥ.rlakṣaṇayā brahmātmaikyajñānaṃ vidyāt prāpnuyāt |
anena prakāreṇa jñātavyamityarthaḥ ||30||

ātmasvarūpajñāne atannirasanābhāve kā kṣatirityāśaṃkya atannirasanābhāve ātmā jñātumaśakyaḥ, yathā nāyaṃ sarpa ityāropitasyāpakaraṇābhāveSM reads api here which is superfluous. rajjujñānaṃ notpadyate tadvadanātmanirasanābhāve ātmāSM reads anātmanirasanenātmā jñātavyaḥ. na jñāyate ityāśayavānāhaSM reads āviṣkaroti instead of āha āvidyaketi.--āvidyakamiti |

dehendriyādi sarvaṃ dṛśyajātamāvidyakaṃ dṛśyatvāt, budbudavat kṣaraṃ naśvaram, etadvilakṣaṇaṃ nirmalaṃ nirupādhikaṃ nityamekaṃ saccidānandātmakaṃSM omits saccidānandātmakaṃ. brahmaivāhamasmīti vidyāt; tataḥ kṛtakṛtyo bhavatītyarthaḥ ||31||

evamuktarītyātmānamadvayānandaṃSM reads ātmānandaṃ for ātmānamadvayānandaṃ. vākyārthajñānenāparokṣatayā jñātvā svānubhavaviṣṭambhenāIM reads avaṣṭambhena for viṣṭambhena.tmanyevātmanā mananaprakāramāha pañcabhiḥIM reads deheti pañcabhiḥ. ślokaiḥ--dehānyatvāditi |
jaḍadṛśyatvādisvabhāvasthūlaśarīrānyatvāt 'me' mamaIM omits mama janmajaḍākārśyādayo na santi, indriyādibhirasaṅgatvācchabdādiviṣayabhogaiḥ saṅgānubhavo nāstyeva ||32||
amanastvāditiSM omits amanastāditi. |

athamindriyaprāṇamanasā nāvabhāsate ityāśaṃkya śrutiṃ pramāṇayati aprāṇa Muṇḍakopaniṣad--2.1 iti spaṣṭārthaḥ ||33IM omits spaṣṭārthaḥ and separately reads spaṣṭam with the No.33. Hence subsequent numbers of IM tally with our numbers, which were ahead by one up to this, due to inclusion of verse No. 8.||
guroḥ prasādātIM reads guruprasādāt svānubhavasiddhamarthamabhinayati 'nirguṇa' ityādibhistribhiḥ ślokaiḥ |

ahaṃ nirguṇo buddhyabhāvāt, niṣkriya indriyādyabhāvāt, nityo'parokṣatvātIM reads here nitya aparokṣayā bhāvāt, and SM reads nityāparokṣatvābhāvāt which are evidently misreadings. The reading might possibly be nityo'parokṣatayābhāvāt or nityo nityāparokṣatvabhāvāt., nirvikalpo vikalpābhāvātIM reads saṃkalpavikalpābhāvāt., nirañjano'saṅgatvāt, nirvikāro niravayavatvāt, nityamukto bandhābhāvāt, nirmalo'vidyātatkāryarahitatvāt ||34||

lg.l: sadā sarvasamaḥ śuddhoVanivilas edition reads siddho for śuddho. niḥsaṅgo nirmalo'calaḥ ||35||

div.p: nanu pūrvoktahetubhirevaṃ IM reads viśiṣṭasvarūpaprajñāsiṣamityuktaṃ; SM reads viśiṣṭaṃ svarūpaṃ jñānasiddhamiti, muktvetat kimiti viśiṣṭam...viśiṣṭasvarūpaṃ jñānaṃ siddhamityuktaṃ tat kiṃviśiṣṭamityāśakyāha--ahamākāśavaditi |

ahamākāśavat sarvasya dṛśyajaḍasyaIM reads sarvajagato. bahirantargato'cyutaḥ cyutirahitaḥ, sadā sarvasamo viṣameṣvapi samatayāSM reads samaṃ. vyāpya sthitaḥ, tathā śuddho nirlepaḥ, acalaḥ pūrṇasya calanābhāvātSM reads pūrṇasya calanābhāva iti yāvat. ||35||

lg.l: satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ yat paraṃ brahmāhameva tat ||36||

div.p: nityaśuddheti |

ekamakhaṇḍānandaṃ dvitīyābhāvādadvayaṃThe commentator seems to take the readings as advayam instead of avyayam. satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ yat paraṃ brahmeti śrutyāTaittirīyopaniṣad--2.1. pratipādyate tadeva tatSM reads tadbrahmāhameva tadasmīti. paraṃ brahmaivāhamasmīti svarūpaṃIM reads svarūpatattvaṃ for svarūpaṃ. kathitam ||36||

lg.l: evaṃ nirantarakṛtā brahmaivāsmīti vāsanāIM reads the line as evaṃ nirantaraṃ brahmaivāhamasmīti vāsanā. |

div.p: pūrvaślokoktamananaṃ cirakālābhyastaṃ sat kiṃSM omits kiṃ. puruṣārtha sādhayatītyāha--evaṃ nirantarakṛteti |

evamuktaprakāreṇa brahmaivāhamasmīti nairantaryeṇa cirakālābhyastā kāsanā avidyākṛtavikṣepānniḥśeṣato nāśayati, yathā rasāyanamauṣadhaṃ cirakālasevitaṃ sadIM reads tadrogaṃ for sad rogān. rogānniḥśeṣato nāśayati tadvadityarthaḥ ||37||
brahmānusandhāne sādhananiyamānāhaIM reads brahmānusandhānasādhane niyamānāha.--viviktadeśa iti |

janasaṃbandhavarjiteIM reads viviktadeśe before janasaṃbandhavarjite. deśe āsīnaḥ sukhopaviṣṭaḥ, virāgaḥ sarvatra gatābhilāṣo'ta eva nirjitānīndriyāṇi yena saḥ, anantamaparicchinnamekamadvayaṃ tamātmānam, ananyadhīrbrahmaṇyeva sthitā niścayātmikā buddhiryasya tādṛśo bhāvayeddhyāyet ||38||
dṛśyaprapañce jāgratiIM omits jāgrati. sati IM reads kathamekatvaṃ bhavati. kathametattattvabhāvanā sambhavatī tyata āha--ātmanyeveti |

akhilaṃ dṛśyajātaṃ sudhīḥ śuddhāntaḥkaraṇaḥ san śuddhayā dhiyā ātmanyeva samādhisamaye pravilāpya prakarṣeṇa nāśayitvā tadā dvitīyābhāvādekamātmānaṃ sajyotiṣkākāśavadSM reads something unintelligible. IM reads sadā jyotsnākāśavat. bhāvayedavatiṣṭhetSM reads tiṣṭhet for avatiṣṭhet. ||39||
paramārthadarśī munirnāmarūpavarṇādikaṃ sarvaṃ vihāya paripūrṇajñānānandarūpa evāvatiṣṭhate ityata āha--rūpavarṇādikamitiIM reads ślokaścāyaṃ spaṣṭārthaḥ. spaṣṭārthaḥ ||40||
nanu IM reads pramātrādi.mātrāditripuṭijñānaṃ vartamānamupalabhyate kathamekatvabhāvanetyāśaṃkya paramātmani bhedo nāstyevetyāha--jñātriti |
IM reads jñātrādibhedaḥ paramātmani na vidyate, sa bhedaḥ kalpita.jñātṛjñānajñeyabhedaḥ kalpita ātmanyababhāti, jñānānandaikarupatvādātmā svayameva dīpyateIM reads dīpyati. prakāśate ||41||
evaṃ viśuddhavastudhyātuḥ pratyakṣaphalamāha--evamātmeti |

ātmaiva pūrvo'raṇirantaḥkaraṇamevottarāraṇiḥHere both the manuscripts are confused and incorrect in their readings; so, the possible correct reading has been given. dhyānena tayormathane sarvadā kṛte tatroditā jvālārūpāvagatirjñānaṃIM omits jñānaṃ. vidyā ajñānamevendhanaṃSM reads avidyāmevendhanaṃ mūlājñānaṃIM omits mūlājñānaṃ niḥśeṣataḥ saparikaraṃ nāśayati; tadā mumukṣuḥ svārājyo'bhiṣiktaḥ kṛtakṛtyo bhavatītyarthaḥ ||42||
jīvaparayoratyantaikyajñānenāvidyāparikalpiteSM reads here āvidyāparikalpitākṛtatamase niḥśeṣamapahna te. saṃtamase niḥśeṣamapagate sati paramātmā svayamevāvirbhavedityāha--aruṇeti |
aruṇaprakāśenādau andhakāre kṣaye'ṃśumān yathāvirbhavatiIM reads āvirbhavet for āvirbhavati. tathātmāpītyarthaḥ ||43||
ātmā sarvadā parokṣasvabhāvatvādaprāpta eva, sa ātmā kadā prāpto bhavediti śiṣyābhiprāyamāśaṃkyāha IM omits āśaṃkya.--ātmā tu satatamiti |

ātmā sarvatra pūrṇo'dvayānandarūpaḥ sarvadā prāpta evāvidyāvaśād bhrāntyā aprāpta ivābhāti, tannāśe tadāvaraṇāvidyānāśe vākyaśravaṇāt prāpta SM reads eva for iva.ivābhāti kanṭhagatacāmīkaranyāyenetyarthaḥ ||44||

lg.l: jīvasya tāttvike rūpe tasmin dṛṣṭe nivartate ||45||

div.p: nanu jīvasya paramātmanaikyamayuktaṃ paramātmano jīvatvavirodhisvabhāvatvāttatrāhaIM reads jīvaparamātmanorekatvamayuktamityāśaṃkyāha.--sthāṇāviti |

SM wrongly omits from yathāndhakārasthite upto āroṣyate.yathāndhakārasthite sthāṇau puruṣo'yamiti coraśaṃkayā bibhyati tathaivāvicārāt brahmaṇi jīvatvamāropyate, tathāSM reads yathā for tathā. śāstropadeśajanitavivekadṛṣṭyāSM wrongly śāstropadeśadṛṣṭyā. tasya jīvasya tāttvikarūpe lakṣye SM wrongly reads tāttvikarūpeṇālakṣye sati. tattvaṃpadārtheSM reads tvaṃpadārthe. dṛṣṭe jñāte brahmaṇi bhrāntyā IM omits brahmaṇi bhrāntyā. kalpitatvājjīvatvamapi nivartate, brahmaivāhamiti jānātītyarthaḥ ||45||
ahaṃ mameti pratyaye jāgrati kathaṃ nāhamiti pratyaya ityāśaṃkya tadapi tathaiva mṛṣā ityāha--tattvasvarūpeti |
jīvaparamātmanorekatvānubhavādutpannaṃIM reads tattvasvarūpānubhavādutpannaṃ. yajjñānaṃ tadahaṃ mametyajñānaṃ bādhate, digbhramādivaditi bhānudarśanādityarthaḥ ||46||
ahaṃ mameti pratyaye naṣṭe yogī samyagvivekavān san vijñānena cakṣuṣā sarvaṃ dṛśyaṃ prapañcaṃ svātmanyevānubhavena paśyatītyāha--samyagiti |
ekamātmānaṃ sarvaṃ paśyati, tadā tadrūpo bhavatīti bhāvaḥSM omits the whole of this commentary and only reads ahaṃ mameti pratyayerthaḥ, which is evidently a misreading. ||47||

lg.l: ātmaivedaṃ jagat sarvamātmano'nyanna vidyateVanivilas edition reads na kiñcana. |

div.p: nanvātmā sarva na bhavati pratyakṣavirodhāt, nānātvena dṛśyamānamidaṃ sarvaṃ IM reads sa for sarvaṃ. kathamātmanyabhedena paśyatītyāha--ātmaivedamiti |
idaṃ sarvaṃ jagadātmaivātmakāryatvādato'nyadātmano na kiñcidvidyate, yathā ghaṭaśarāvādikāryaṃ IM reads mṛtkārya for kāryaṃ. mṛdo'nyannāsti |
ataḥ svātmanyeva sarvaṃ dṛśyajātamabhedenekṣate paśyati, vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyamiti śruteḥChāndyogyopaniṣad--6.1 ||48||
evambhūtāvasthaiva jīvanmuktirityāha jīvanmuktistviti |

anādyavidyāparikalpitapūrvopādhiṃ dehamanobuddhyādīn guṇān sattvādīn parityajet, tadaivaIM reads iti iyameva jīvanmuktirityucyate. jīvanmukta ityucyate; sa jīvanmuktaḥIM omits sa jīvanmuktaḥ saccidānandādiguṇakatvādbhramarakīṭavat sākṣādbrahma bhajet prāpnotītyarthaḥ ||49||
tattvajñāstu ātmārāmaḥ sukhaṃ tiṣṭhatītyāha--tīrtvā moharṇavamiti |

moha eva arṇavo'paryantatvāt, taṃ jñānaplavena tīrtvā niḥśeṣaṃ nāśayitvā, rāgadveṣādaya eva rākṣasā mokṣaparipanthinaḥ,SM misreads mohāvṛta for mokṣaparipanthinaḥ. tān niḥśeṣato nāśayitvā śāntisamāyuktaḥ śamadamādisahita ātmārāma ātmanyevaIM omits eva. ārāmaḥSM omits ārāmaḥ. krīḍā yasya sa virājate svārājyenābhiṣiktaḥ prakāśate |

arthāntaraṃ dhvanyate--śrīrāmaḥIM reads rāmākhyo rāmaḥ. samurdra tīrtvā rāvaṇādirākṣasān itvā, sītā evaSM omits eva, and IM reads iva for eva. śāntistayā sameto virājate, ayodhyāyāṃ vijṛmbhateIM omits vijṛmbhate. ||50||
jīvanmuktasya lakṣaṇamāha--bāhyānityeti |
bāhyandriyaviṣayodbhavāmanityasukhasyāsaktiṃ prīti savāsanāṃSM reads sarvaṃ for savāsanāṃ. hitvā, tatra heturātmasukhena nirvṛtaḥ |
ghaṭasthadīpavadantareva prakāśate, svasākṣikabhevātmānubhavasukhamitarairna jñāyate ityarthaḥ ||51||
evamuktaprakāreṇa jīvanmuktaḥ ā ārabdhasaṃkṣayādityarthaḥ. sannārabdhasaṃkṣayādevaṃ IM reads vartate for vatitavyam.vartitavyamityāha--upādhistho'pīti |

dehādyupādhau sākṣitayā sthito'pi munirvyomavattaddharmaiSM reads dharmaiḥ.rnānuliptaḥ, mama karmalepoSM misreads karmalopo for karmalepo. nāstīti bhāvayet, sarvajño'piSM omits api. mūḍhavat IM reads ajñavat for prākṛtavat.prākṛtavattiṣṭhet, sarvatra viṣayeṣu yudṛcchāprāpteṣvanāsaktoIM reads āsaktirahitaḥ sana. vāyuvaccaret ||52||

lg.l: jale jalaṃ viyadvomni tejastojasi vā yathā ||53||

div.l: upādhibhūtadehadvayalaye prārabdhakarmakṣaye muniryogī viṣṇau sarvavyāpake parabrahmaṇi nirviśeṣaṃ yathā bhavet tathā viśet |

div.p: brahmaṇaḥ sarvādhiṣṭhānatvāt taṭasthalakṣaṇenābhidhīyate ślokadvayena yallābhādityādi |

yadbrahmasākṣātkāralābhādaparo lābho na vidyate sarvalābhānām tatraivāntarbhāvātIM reads antarbhūtatvāt for antarbhāvāt. yathā brahmānande kṣudrānandānāmantarbhāvaḥ, yatsukhādbrahmānubhavasukhādaparaṃ sukhaṃ nāsti niratiśayasukhatvāt, yajjñānād brahmasākṣātkārajñānādaparaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti mokṣahetutvāt, brahmeti tajjānīyāt ||54||

lg.l: yaddṛṣṭvā nāparaṃ dṛśyaṃ yadbhūtvā na punarbhavaḥ |

div.p: yaddṛṣṭvetiSM omits yaddṛṣṭveti. |

yaddṛṣṭvāparaṃIM reads anyad for aparaṃ. draṣṭavyaṃ nāsti tenaiva puruṣārthasya siddhatvāt, yadbhūtvāSM omits yadbhūtvā. yenaikyaṃ prāpyaIM reads gatvā for prāpya. punaIM reads punarbhavajanmādikaṃ.rjanmādikaṃ nāsti, yajjñātvā yatsvarūpaṃ jñātvānyajjñeyaṃ nāsti, tadeva brahmetyavadhārayet |
anyat sarvaṃ vṛthā pāṇḍityamityarthaḥ ||55||

lg.l: akhaṇḍaṃVanivilas edition reads anantaṃ. nityamekaṃ yattadbrahmetyavadhārayet ||56||

div.p: tiryagūrdhvamadhaḥ sarvatra brahmaiva pūrṇamityāha--tiryagūrdhvamiti spaṣṭo'rthaḥIM reads spaṣṭārthaḥ. ||56||

IM reads atadvyāvṛttīti.akhaṇḍānandamekaṃ brahma vedāntairatadvyāvṛttirūpeṇāSM reads rūpaiḥ for rūpeṇa.tannirasanadvārā jñātavyamityāhaIM reads ityarthaḥ for ityāha.-- atadvyāvṛttirūpeṇetiIM omits atadvyāvṛttirūpeṇeti. spaṣṭo'rthaḥIM reads ayamapi spaṣṭārthaḥ. ||57||
nanu brahmādayo'pi niratiśayānandinaSM reads as sātiśayānandina. eva śrūyante, tatrāha--akhaṇḍetyādi |

brahmendrādayaḥ paricchinnānandina eva, brahma tu IM reads akhaṇḍānubhavarūpatvāt.akhaṇḍānandarūpatvādaparicchinnamānandam SM reads ānandameva rūpaṃ, and IM reads ānandameva svarūpaṃ., evaṃ svarūpaṃ SM reads ānandasamudrasya after tasya. yasya tasya ānandaleśamāśritya brahmendrādayo'pyānandino bhavanti ānandatāratamyeṇa, etasyaivānandasyānyāni bhūtāni mātrāmupajīvantītyādiśruteḥBṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣad--4.3 ||58||

nanu yadiIM omits nanu yadi. paramapremāspadamātmaivaIM reads premāspadatayātmaiva. bhātītyucyate tadā kathaṃ dehādiprapañco'piIM reads etadayuktamātmaviddehādiprapañcaḥ. priyataro'nubhūyate ityāśaṃkyāha--tadyuktamiti |
akhiladehādyanātmavastvapi tatIM reads tadyuktaṃ. tenātmanā saṃyuktameva priyataraṃ laukiko'pi vyavahārastadyuktaIM reads tadyuktarūpa eva. eva priyataraḥ |

tasmāt sarvagataṃ brahma anantaṃ priyaṃ, yathā kṣīraṃ sarvaṃ vyāpya IM reads ghṛtamevāsti, but SM omits evama and misreads vastvapi.ghṛtamiti evamavastvapi brahmavyāptatvāt priyamivaIM reads priyameva. bhāti |
ata ātmaiva priyatama iti siddham ||59||

tarhyātmā kena prakāreṇa sarvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhatītyāśaṃkya sākṣādvaktumaśakyatvādanaṇu asthūlamiti śruteḥBṛhadāraṇyakopaniṣad--3.8. But the reading should be asthūlamanaṇu, etc. IM omits the śruti. sattārūpeṇa bhātītyāha-- anaṇvasthūlamitiIM reads ata eveti spaṣṭārthaḥ which is evidently a misreading. spaṣṭo'rthaḥ ||60||

lg.l: yadbhāsāIM reads yadbhāserbhāsyate. bhāsyate'rkādi bhāsyairyattuIM reads yattanna bhāsyate. na bhāsyate |

div.p: punastadbrahmetiIM omits iti. jñānārthaṃ ślokatrayena pṛthaḍanirūpayati--yadbhāsetiIM reads yaditi. |

yadvastu bhānvādīn bhāsayetIM reads avabhāsayet. yaccaIM reads yattu. bhāsyairarkādibhirnaivaIM reads rna bhāsyate. bhāsyate, na tatra sūryo bhāti na candratārakaṃ nemā vidyuto bhānti kṛto'yamagnistameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhātīti śruteḥKaṭhopaniṣad--2.2.; yena sarvamidaṃ bhūtabhautikabhāvarūpaṃ jagatbhāti tadbrahmeti jānīyāt ||61||
SM omits this portion from taptāyaḥ upto ityāha.taptāyaḥpiṇḍavat svayamevāntarbahirvyāpya bhāsayannakhilaṃ brahma prakāśate ityāha svayamantariti spaṣṭo'rthaḥIM reads spaṣṭārthaḥ. ||62||
punastadevāha--jagadvilakṣaṇamitiIM reads jagaditi. |

sarvaṃ brahmaiva satyaṃ; tathāpi jagadrupeṇa yadāSM reads yathā. paśyati SM reads tathā.tadā na gṛhyate, jagadvailakṣaṇyena tatkāraṇatvenaSM reads kāraṇakāryatvena vicāryate cettadā jñātuṃ śakyaṃ brahmaṇo'nyanna vidyateIM reads iti after vidyate. |

yadito'nyaddṛśyateIM misreads tato sat dṛśya yatkiñcit, etc. yatkiñcit tanmṛṣaiva IM reads mṛgatṛṣṇājalavadityarthaḥ. marumarīcikāvannirjaladeśasthasūryakiraṇāropitajalavadityarthaḥ.IM omits from nirjaladeśastha upto jalavadityarthaḥ. ||63||

lg.l: dṛśyate śrūyate yadyadbrahmaṇo'nyanna tadbhavetIM reads na kiñcana for na tadbhavet. |

div.p: punastadeva brahmaIM omits brahma. sphuṭaṃ nirūpayati dṛśyate iti |

IM reads as cakṣuṣā ca dṛśyate śrotreṇā śruyate yanmanasā smaryate yacca vācā abhidhīyate, etc. tattvajñānāttatsarvaṃ brahma saccidānandamadvayaṃ brahmānyannaIM reads brahmaṇo'nyanna. kiñcidastītyarthaḥ ||64||

lg.l: ajñānacakṣurnekṣateIM reads nekṣeta for nekṣate. bhāsvantaṃ bhānumandhavat ||65||

div.p: svargamiti |
śrutiśca--na cakṣuṣā gṛhyate nāpi vācā nānyairdevaistapasā karmaṇā vā |
jñānaprasādena viśuddhasattvastatastu taṃ paśyati niṣkalaṃ dhyāyamānaMuṇḍakopaniṣad (3.1). Insertion of this Upaniṣad text and the following two lines seem somewhat redundant. iti |

yadi sarvagataṃ brahma tarhiSM reads tat. sarvaiḥ kiṃ na dṛśyate ityāśaṃkya cakṣurādibhirna gṛhyate iti tat śrutyāIM reads ityanayā śrutyā for iti tat śrutyā. pratipādayatiSM wrongly reads cakṣuṣeti after pratipādayati. |

IM reads some unintelligible words and then reads viśuddhasattaḥ nivṛttyāvidyaḥ sadā (savatra brahmaiva, etc.) and omits from yo'jñānacakṣu upto jñānacakṣuṣā. yo'jñānacakṣuḥ sa sarvagamapi saccidānandaṃ brahma na paśyapi yathā prakāśamānamapi bhānumandho na paśyati; jñānaprasādena jñānacakṣuṣā sarvatra brahmaiva paśyatītyarthaḥ ||65||

IM reads evamāmukteranubhavasampannasyāpi.evaṃ tāvaduktarītyānubhavasampannasyāpi tadabhyāsarahitasya vāsanāvaśāt kiñcidajñānaṃ sambhavati tatparihārārthaṃ punaḥ śravaṇādikaṃIM misreads smaraṇādikaṃ. kuryādityāha--śravaṇādibhiriti |

jīvaḥ pratyagātmā etatprakāreṇaIM reads etatprakaraṇārthaḥ for etatprakāreṇa. uktārthasyaIM omits uktārthasya. śravaṇamananādibhiruccairdīptaḥ prakāśita jñānamevāgnistena paritāpitaḥ parito viśeṣataśca śodhita ityarthaḥIM reads paritaḥ viśodhita ityartha for the whole portion. |

sarvasaṃsāramūlājñānamalānmuktaḥIM reads mūlabhūtājñāna. svayameva samyak prakāśate, yathāgninā IM reads svarṇam upādhikṛtaṃ durvaṇādi hitvā svarūpeṇa prakāśate tadvadityarthaḥ.paritāpitaṃ suvarṇaṃ prakāśate ||66||
evaṃ viśodhito jīvaḥ paramātmā hṛdākāśeIM reads hṛdayākāśe. uditaḥ san tamo'jñānamupasaṃharan bhānuvat sarvasvarūpaprakāśeSM reads sarvajñarūpeṇa prakāśate. ityāha--hṛdākāśodita iti |
ātmabodhaIM omits ātma. eva bhānuḥ, sarvasyādhāramūtatvāt sarvavyāpī sarvadhārī ca, śeṣaṃ spaṣṭam ||67||

lg.l: saḥ svātmatīrthaṃ bhajate viniṣkriyaḥ sa sarvavit sarvagato'mṛto bhavet ||68||

div.p: nanvātmajñāsyāpi jñanapratibandhakaduritanivāraṇārthaṃIM reads parihārārthaṃ for nivārārthaṃ. prayāgāditīrthayātrodyogaḥSM reads yātodyogaḥ. kartavya ityāśaṃkya svātmatīrtheIM reads svātmatīrthasnātasya. snātasya na kiñcit kartavyamapītmāhaIM omits api. --digdeśakālādīti |
yo viniṣkriyaḥ paramahaṃsa ātmatīrthaṃIM reads svātmatorthaṃ. bhajate saḥSM omits saḥ. sarvavit sarvajñaḥ sarvatragaḥ IM reads sarvatraparamātmasvarūpatvāt. paramātmasvarūpatvādamṛto mukto bhavet |

kathaṃbhūtaṃIM reads kiṃbhūtaṃ. svātmatīrthaṃ, digdeśakālādyanapekṣyaiva sarvagataṃIM reads sarvagaṃ. śītādidvandvaduḥkhādiIM reads... dukhāni. haratīti śītādihṛt, nityasukhaṃ mokṣānandaprāpakatvāt, itaratīrtheṣu tadviparītaṃ draṣṭavyam |
tasmādātmatīrthe snātasya na kiñcidavaśiṣyat iti bhāvaḥ ||68||

div.trailer: iti ātmabodhatīkā sampūrṇāIM reads--iti śrīparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryagovindabhagavatpādapūjyaśrīmacchaṃkarācāryaviracitamātmabodhaprakaraṇaṃ saṭīkaṃ sampūrṇam ||
